pro.title: Pro

cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Content?
cta.description: Join thousands of creators who save hours every week with AI-powered editing. Start your free trial today - no credit card required.

audioEnhancement.title: Pro Audio Enhancement
audioEnhancement.description: Removes filler words, long pauses, background noise, and normalizes audio levels for crystal-clear Russian and English speech

videoAssembly.title: Auto Video Assembly
videoAssembly.description: Seamlessly stitches together video fragments for smooth storytelling flow

viralClips.title: Viral Clips Generator
viralClips.description: Creates engaging short-form content for TikTok, Reels, and YouTube Shorts with trending music

export.title: One-Click Export
export.description: Export in multiple formats optimized for different social media platforms

hero.title: Transform Your Media
hero.description: Upload your audio or video files and let our AI process them with advanced algorithms tailored for each media type.

loginRequired.title: Please log in to upload your media
loginRequired.description: You must be logged in to use the AI-powered media processor.

uploadArea.title: Drop your media file here, or browse
uploadArea.description: Supports video files (MP4, MOV, MKV) and audio files (MP3, WAV). Maximum file size: 150MB

denoise.title: Denoise
denoise.description: Remove background noise and enhance audio clarity using advanced AI algorithms.

removeFillers.title: Remove Fillers
removeFillers.description: Automatically detect and remove "um", "uh", and other filler words from speech.

errors.fileSizeExceeded: File size ({{fileSize}}) exceeds the maximum limit of {{maxSize}}. Please choose a smaller file.
errors.unsupportedFormat: This file format is not supported. Please use video files (MP4, MOV, MKV) or audio files (MP3, WAV).

shorts.title: Generate Viral
shorts.description: Transform your long-form videos into engaging shorts by automatically extracting the most important clips, adding relevant B-roll footage, and generating synchronized subtitles to maximize viewer engagement.

loginRequired.title: Login Required
loginRequired.description: Please log in to access the AI-powered shorts generator and create viral short videos from your content.

upload.title: Upload Your Video
upload.description: Upload a video file to automatically generate engaging short clips with B-roll and subtitles
upload.requirements: File size must be 100MB or less • Vertical videos are required

processing.analyzing: Analyzing video content and extracting highlights...
processing.addingBroll: Adding B-roll footage and generating subtitles...

success.title: Shorts Generated Successfully!
success.description: Your viral short videos have been created with important clips, B-roll footage, and synchronized subtitles.

errors.title: Generation Error
errors.invalidFileType: Please upload a valid video file (.mp4, .mov, .mkv, .avi, .webm)
errors.fileSizeExceeded: File size too large ({{fileSize}}). Maximum allowed size is {{maxSize}}
errors.unknownError: An unknown error occurred during shorts generation.

auth.registrationSuccessful: Registration successful! You can now log in.

notFound.title: Page Not Found
notFound.description: The page you're looking for seems to have vanished into the digital void. Don't worry, even the best explorers sometimes take a wrong turn.
